meanings.definition: The state or quality of being upright or vertical.
meanings.sent1: His erectness was evident as he stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent2: The tree's erectness made it stand out among the others in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The toy soldier's erectness was comical as it tried to march in a straight line.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper's erectness reached towards the sky, dominating the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The flagpole's erectness symbolized strength and resilience.

meanings.definition: The act of constructing or building something.
meanings.sent1: The erectness of the new building impressed the onlookers.
meanings.sent2: The erectness of the scaffolding indicated that construction was in progress.
meanings.sent3: The erectness of the sandcastle showed the effort put into its creation.
meanings.sent4: The erectness of the crane signaled the beginning of a new project.
meanings.sent5: The erectness of the tent showcased the campers' teamwork in setting it up.

meanings.definition: The state of being alert or attentive.
meanings.sent1: Her erectness during the meeting showed her keen interest in the discussion.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's erectness in the battlefield saved him from a surprise attack.
meanings.sent3: The cat's erectness while hunting a mouse was both graceful and focused.
meanings.sent4: The student's erectness in class indicated his readiness to participate.
meanings.sent5: The dog's erectness when hearing a noise alerted the family to potential danger.
